name: Signal Far Away
description:
Complete those messages, send them to where they should be after their long journey in the universe.  This game now contains three chapters and a complete ending. We want to  make it bigger greater and more like an attractive adventure game which might tell stories about Space Colonization (considering we are fans of Fallout and Outer Worlds) and families. (ONLY A DEMO and ONLY CHINESE for now) 

If you like it, please tell us. This is our first complete game to make!
